skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Expertise in creating dynamic and responsive user interfaces using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript. Proficient in modern front-end frameworks such as React, Angular, and Vue.js.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Skilled in developing robust server-side applications using Node.js,Firebase Python, and PHP. Experience with frameworks like Express.js, Django, and Laravel, and managing databases such as MySQL, MongoDB, and PostgreSQL.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: Proficient in designing user-friendly and visually appealing interfaces. Knowledgeable in user experience principles to ensure intuitive and effective user interactions. Skilled with design tools such as Adobe XD and Figma.

skills.title: Mobile App Development
skills.description: Experienced in developing cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter. Capable of building high-performance and visually appealing apps for both Android and iOS platforms.
